lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Liam is here via Internet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you see him, is he there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go, there's our Liam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Digital Liam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My brother.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't see you, you're hiding in the shadows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you hear me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wonders of the Internet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Always remember Dork.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Never forget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's another shirt. Have a seat. Hello!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can see you guys on Twitch! Did you know you're on the Internet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? You're crazy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone's watching?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't make it weird, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't make it weird, Liam. All right, let's go ahead and plug through these announcements so we can get into the game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First thing, me and Marisha wanted to reach out and let everyone know that we're going to be guests next weekend, I believe it's the 8th through the 10th, at an event called Tekko. Tekko in Pittsburgh. It's an awesome convention, we're going to be doing panels and signings, all that fun stuff. So if any of you are in that area, you should come hang out at Tekko with us, in a week. That would be awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My old stomping grounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: College days, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, sad Affleck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sad Affleck, best game ever. Watched it over and over again. All right, so. Today, guys, is the last day to pre-order your Gilmore's Glorious Goods shirts. We've had them up for a week. There's a delightful presentation by our lovely Liam. You should pick one up. I should pick one up. I don't have one myself, yet. Yeah, go ahead and preorder a copy. We're trying out this new process to get shirts out to everyone, so get that one before they're gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's actually tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tomorrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tomorrow at midnight is the deadline.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So would that be like midnight tonight, or--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See, that's exactly what I was asking Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You smart son of a bitches. It's so simple. Tomorrow at midnight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is like in a few hours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Midnight is still today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure. I could be wrong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's 12:00 am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it ending tomorrow night, or is it ending tonight?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. You should order tonight, just in case!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm scared it's actually ending tonight. He thinks it's tomorrow night, but I think it might be tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be safe, make it tonight, but it's probably tomorrow night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's probably tomorrow night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But to be safe, make it tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to murder us all, very shortly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Save it for the battle. Save it for the battle, Travis. Also, is it already up in the store now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, 6:30 today, it went up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we have two new shirts. Two new shirts available for pre-order, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All these overlapping things happening?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These two new shirts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, what's that say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dagger, dagger, dagger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dagger, dagger-- jagger? Why would it say jagger?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In honor of Mick Jagger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we've got our Critical Role logo on the back. So cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you know it's official.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I really like these ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're soft, they feel very nice on your body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But yeah, those will be up as well for a week for pre-order, so yeah, check those out. Get whatever shirts you can. And I think there's a limited amount available for purchase right away, so if you order fast, you might be able to get them. But that's a very small amount. And also, to everybody that's been messaging us on Twitter, there have been some people that have really been wanting us to expand our sizing and we are definitely working on that. It's hard to find some vendors that can accommodate us, but we're working on it, so hopefully moving forward in the future, we'll have larger sizes available to everyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we're really, really trying to do that. Soon. Soon, we'll have announcements. Great, so there is also-- let's see, Sam, you had an announcement about a cartoon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Zaniness.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kooky zany.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kooky zany. Kooky zany. Big, bright colors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else have any other announcements they want to make?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my gosh, Laura, hold up my boxes. Do you have items that need to be put inside boxes when you're not holding dice? Because Wyrmwood Gaming makes boxes for your dice and if you use the code "critrole"--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Critrole! Critrole!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can get free shipping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) It never makes me not laugh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the way, I have some of Liam's dice in front of me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, snap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe my brother should hang onto his things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't infect my dice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, anything else, guys? We good?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My last episode of Signal Boost is this Tuesday.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean last? You just started!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we rotate hosts out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because it's like our favorite things and I don't want to have to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you're the best host.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, thank you, Sam.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of all the hosts they've had, she certainly was the best one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, she's number one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. I'm glad my friends support me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still your show, you still produce it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, yeah. I'm not letting it go. I'm still producing it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just tell me, am I one of the hosts?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to host?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just tell me when, and I will be probably be 20 minutes late.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'll make that work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't do that to somebody. That's half of the joy of going to the movies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What? Yeah. That's half the joy gone and then you have the movie. Sorry. Anyway, so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh wait, I got one last thing, it's not really a professional announcement, but I am sitting in the kitchen that I grew up in. I'm playing Dungeons & Dragons in the first room that I ever played Dungeons & Dragons in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a wonderful announcement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic. Well, cool, guys, then let's go ahead and get this show on the road. So, last we left off, Vox Machina, having to traverse the world in search of artifacts known as the Vestiges of Divergence, ancient items of power used in massive-scale warfare in ancient moments of history, they had acquired one from a sunken temple of the Champion of the Raven Queen, taking the life, and thankfully not permanently, of Vex'ahlia over here. The party then retrieved their first artifact and made their way towards the Pyrah tribe of the Ashari druids, the Fire Guardians of the Gate to the Elemental Plane of Fire, which apparently Thordak, the Cinder King, the great red dragon that helms the Chroma Conclave that just tore through all of the civilization of Tal'Dorei, emerged from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Apparently."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently." By that I mean, confirmed, universally, tore through. You guys went there, found a surviving faction of the Pyrah tribe, including Cerkonos, their Headmaster, as well as a few members of your tribe, the Air Ashari, Keyleth. And your father. You went towards the remnants of the Cindergrove, ran into an ally, a strange blue-scaled dragonborn by the name of Gern Blanston, master of necromancy and candle-making and combining the two for interesting effect. You fought your way through the Cindergrove, tearing through elementals, encasing efreets in hamster balls and holding them aloft for extended periods of time. Worked out well. And then managed to seal the Gate with the help of the druidic tribes there, Gern, and the intrepid adventurers of Vox Machina. After which, you went to spend the evening there on the mountainside to rest before continuing your journey to wherever that next step may be. So the rest of you are beaten, bruised, and winded over the previous series of battles and the accomplishment you achieved here at the top of the caldera of this mountain. The erupting, seismic energies and molten rock that once spewed from the center of this rift have calmed, and the gate once again has been sealed to its dormant, controllable, and watchable size. You guys are free to make camp wherever you'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We already rested, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet, you're about to set up rest. There are sections, as you're walking out of the Cindergrove, that you can see members of the Pyrah tribe are pulling up still-functional pieces of huts and tents and things that were destroyed when Thordak tore through the rift, and they're beginning to reassemble a place to stay for the evening for themselves, so if you wish to stay among the Pyrah tribe for the evening, it seems to be at least a relatively safe bet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think, Keyleth? I mean, it's your family.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's up to you guys. I don't think I can transport us out of here until we sleep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have no problem sleeping here this evening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm rather winded, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are all the tents and houses made of, anyway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The actual blackened grey rock of this mountain, elements of it have been fused together with bits of glass to forge these thick, very sturdy walls when they aren't being torn through by a colossal red dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (scoffs) Whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So they're being brought back up, druids are using what remains of their powers from the fight today to assemble more walls of stone, and they're basically creating ramshackle living spaces using their magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and assist them, because I didn't use any 5th-level spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you begin throwing up some stone walls to help build a small shelter for the evening. The rest--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Gern completely out of the picture, have we lost sight of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've lost sight of Gern, Gern went back into the Cindergrove and began essentially gutter-sniping what pieces of red dragon scales he could locate in the vicinity. He has not been seen since that moment. Who knows to where he wandered?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Key-leth? If I may.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, Scan-lan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said that so weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's how it's spelled: Key-leth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So regal of you, Scan-lan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are your people comfortable in these little huts and stuff, are we going to be safe tonight? Because I could assist us with slightly better shelter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like how, what do you mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my magical... dalliances.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that another name for your penis?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to poop us a bed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could poop us a bed. Are we okay here, safely, or should I get us something special?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With your dalliance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my dalliance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think your penis may have more names than I do, I'm kind of horrified.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I want a house from your balls and bits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, my people have lived here for thousands of years.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but their shelters are destroyed now, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, I mean, generally we're safe as long as dragons aren't smashing through the village, but I mean, if you have an alternative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have an alternative. I could do a bit of dalliancing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, you've talked about it so much now, Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this going to be self-dalliance or are you going to need a partner or two?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, are we just going to watch you diddle yourself? Let's have it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mushroom-stamp the land, let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, so I will take a minute and cast Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so proud of you. I am so proud of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys watch as Scanlan rummages through some of his side pouches and belongings, pulls out a few elements, a small doorway carved from ivory. He pulls out a piece of polished marble, a tiny silver spoon, and puts them on the ground in front of him, closes his eyes for a second--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I enchant it with a little song or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you may.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'll sing (singing) It's a sick house, it's mighty mighty, it's letting it all hang-- that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are mildly confused, but as he picks up the items, you can see the door sets off this small spark of white energy that glistens in the air, hovers, and then creates a somewhat shimmering doorway, just standing in the center of the space in front of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you like to come into my place? It's a little modest shack that I've been working on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this a teleport sort of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this a joke?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing on the other side of it, is there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, it's a place where we can rest for the evening, totally safe and comfortable. It's on a slightly different plane from ours, so nothing can actually hurt us there or get to us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it that fire plane where we just-- there's no dragons in that plane?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't checked in a while. Actually, this is my first time doing this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should send somebody ahead first to check. Vax, are you up to the bit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I up to what? What was that, Grog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's totally safe, don't worry, don't worry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As long as you're not going to whip out the cube, then lead the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many people can fit in there? It's pretty big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any creature you designate when you cast the spell to enter. So you could say the entire Pyrah tribe if you wanted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody in the group, or the Pyrah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, there's close to 35, including the Zephrah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, could you technically do this with any refugees? I mean, where do they go when you make the door go away?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is my place, all right? I don't want any riffraff in there. Listen, there's a guest list, there's a guy at the door--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can solve this really quickly. Are any of the Pyrah tribe hot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, attractive?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Attractive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're all hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through the soot and ash and the rather somber atmosphere here that paints them as a people that are the survivors of a horrible calamity, beyond that, there's probably a few that you'd consider attractive, sure, if you're that kind of person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That one over there was looking at you, I saw her wink at you earlier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should impress her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one with her face just sheared off?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, why not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Not really my type. I like full-faced people, but I'll take it, I'll take my chance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's big of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, if there's anyone from your immediate family that you'd like to give lodging to tonight-- okay, we'll take them all, we'll take them all in. We'll take them all in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. Do you want to tell them? It is your humble abode.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashari people!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see some of them stop and drop the rocks they're currently holding and building some of these small shelters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Believe me, it's going to be okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look at each other with a strange glance and continue building their current shelters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why the fuck not? And I walk on through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You open the door, and as you grab it, it is a solid door, and the handle spins, you look inside, and within you see an incredibly lush foyer to a grand mansion, a 25-, 30-foot ceiling made of marble and dark woods, you see a two-part staircase that splits off onto a second-tier floor, you hear soft music playing in the distance, and immediately you see two somewhat ethereal servants come down, dressed as a butler and a maid, they come down, with an echoing voice that say, "How might we be of service?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi. I step in after her. Yes, I've made some changes to the place. Living quarters are upstairs, there's a kitchen, parlor, game room over there, billiards, all sorts of stuff. We have a music room. There are a hundred attendants who can wait on us. I've assigned some of them specific jobs. Five are going to play music for us wherever we want, especially during our meals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me take your things, Master."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes, yes, here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I come inside and I see the ethereal things, I'm like, ghosts! And I take Craven Edge and I swing at the ethereal sumbitch!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you attacking my attendants?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, the ghosts in your house!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're my people!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the time you go to stop him, three of the servants that have grabbed a few of your belongings and been carrying away, are swung at, Craven Edge passing through, and their energy dispersing, and their contents of whatever they're carrying drop and clink to the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus Christ--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank god I'm here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, Grog, easy. Easy. They're not ghosts, they're not ghosts. They are supernatural spirits-- some would say ghosts-- that are good, they serve us, they serve me--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, do you pay them or do they just work for you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're slave ghosts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is terrible. Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, no, they like it for some reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can command them to do literally anything and they like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you asked them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Watch this. Watch this. I call one over. You there, you there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This maid comes over, a plumper older woman, no feet, just drifting along with this path of mist behind her. "Yes, Master?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you please braid my chest hair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But of course, Master."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you like this job?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is my purpose, Master."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See? This is what I'm telling you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your purpose, do you enjoy your purpose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not very long, but sure enough, there is a pattern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, you're dismissed. Back to the music room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, Master."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you tip them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can tip me, I'll pass it out later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I believe you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, you there, you, ghostie, do you have any ale in this establishment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But of course, sir. We have an entire winery as part of the mansion."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What in the fuck is this place? How are you doing this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bring your most expensive frosty glass of ale.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull Scanlan over to the side. Have you always been able to do this? Have you been holding out on us, man?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It never occurred to me to do this before, for some reason.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You shouldn't be Burt Reynolds, you should be Hugh Hefner from now on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would not hold out on you. This is a new skill that I've just learned, and I'm still making improvements to the house. You'll see that our dining room has a portrait of myself in it. Not the one that I had commissioned, but one that I had envisioned before. It's just me in a smoking jacket standing in front of a fireplace with me in a smoking jacket above it, Stephen Colbert-style.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we all have our own separate rooms. All of the beds are circular, they all have a mirror over them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. It's Graceland!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mine is a waterbed, so be careful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So wait, you built this entire castle, so how do we know that you haven't installed creepy spy things into our rooms, Scanlan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, little peep holes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't trust you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On we go to the rest of it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm waiting on my beer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a great idea. Let's get some beer, let's take a rest, and in the morning we can go to the game room, get some dice and some paper--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A game within a game. The Inception (bass note).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's called Meta and Dragons, we're just going to see how deep it goes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth just gets a nosebleed for no reason. She's not sure why.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Had to get that out of my system.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An ever-spinning top on the banister. At this point, Grog, you can see that the servant you had sent off comes up with a very large, somewhat spectral flagon, that upon handing it to you, turns into a solid metallic form, and inside--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- a very, very finely chilled, very nice-smelling wine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I put my hand up for a high-five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It makes contact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little cushy, but it does make contact, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, these servants will do whatever you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is terrible, it's a terrible path you're going down right now, I am uncomfortable with this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am way ahead of you, Grog. I'm way ahead of you. As I said, there are 100 servants here. 50 of them are assigned to me and my own personal service. The rest are available to you in whatever capacity you'd like them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is going to be the best night ever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me go try and gather the rest of the Ashari.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So uncomfortable right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get a plate of food from one of the ghosts as proof?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's about to get Caligula up in this bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The servants gather up a platter of food, piling up, grapes and meats and cured ham.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just pop out of the door and address the people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you pop out of the door, it all turns to smoke and dissipates.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's actually really nice. It's been rough, why don't we all take a night off and everyone come in and get some food. Take a night off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, where are we staying? Where's our rooms?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You will find comfortable beds and things in every room. The two rooms next to mine are reserved--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One is for Pike, the other across the hallway is for Kaylie, just in case she ever drops by.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really sweet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Weird, but sweet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, it's not weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keeping her close to my heart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's super-duper weird. It's really weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When you have a daughter, you can worry about her as much as I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, you guys are welcome to rest for the evening, if you'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the door protected? Can anybody come in, or is it only if you invite them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only invited.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How-- I mean-- what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many times can you do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Once a day, but that's all we'll need, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, yeah. Wait, wait, wait, so if we were in a fight and things went really south--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could take a break.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) No, but they could run away, it's not like time freezes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It does take a while to cast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a minute, so yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It takes a minute to cast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it can't be the middle of a battle, sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything else you can do that you haven't-- can you make an army of unicorns or a giant in a dancing dress, or is this the extent of what you can do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd like to keep a few secrets, if you don't mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you make fart sounds with your armpits?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I can bend my thumb all the way back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out my crystal and I call upon the great power of Trinket. I choose you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a flash of deep blue and black light, Trinket emerges (bear noises).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a mansion! You built a Trinket room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what, I totally forgot to build Trinket a place to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay, he'll stay in Kaylie's room for the time being, and then--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no, Kaylie's room is locked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike loves him, I bet he wouldn't mind--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's the third pantry. The third pantry could possibly work. It has some just mostly-- no, no, it's full, we can't use that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any rooms with very high ceilings?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The very front?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The front hall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I mean somewhere I could put a bed for myself and Trinket with very high ceilings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, yes, there's a whole basement area. It's a large space.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wonderful. I'll move my bed down there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's for training and working with weapons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That'll be perfect. Trinket needs to train.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go down there and I'll stay with Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I want to train a little, want to work out a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Totally. I understand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. I need a target, though. Hey, can you call one of those little ghostly guys over?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can have five of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right, fine. The first one of you that brings me a cow wins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look at each other. "Right away, sir." And all five of them drift off. A moment later, they all return with a spectral cow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like five cows, they each return with one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, each one of them is just traveling with one cow, they've all brought you together one spectral cow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like a bunch of Mr. Meeseeks with cows. Do I get to pick a cow? There's just one cow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's just one cow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. So can I touch the cow on the head?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You touch it, and it has weight to it, it has surface area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're killing cows, we're killing, we're killing poor servants--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not killing anything! And I punch the cow in the nose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so dark!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stay, Bessie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, you just punched a cow in the face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, I'm just seeing if it bled. Did the nose bleed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no blood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I punch it again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog! Stop it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I took a really easy punch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, you're hurting it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm not. Is there any blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No blood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket blocks it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Never mind. You know what, I changed my mind, I don't need a cow. I'm going to go stay in a normal room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Grog, actually, I think you should train for a little bit at least. Just come down to the basement and maybe train for a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, where did that cow come from? I call one of the servants over to me. Can you get anything? Could you get me a small squid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The cow, we happened to have one."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that a real cow, Scanlan, or was that some sort of ghost cow?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ghost cow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point the cow disperses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I punched it so hard it exploded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The ghost of a dinner you've already eaten, come back to haunt you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go down to the training room. And I stop the servant and go, can you bring down a bed for me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. Grog, can we train, please?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You want to train with me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I think I need to train with you, specifically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Always a good time to get better, I guess.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on over there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys walk out of the foyer into the main hallway, and at the end to the left you see a doorway appear where there wasn't one before. It opens up on its own, and as you walk you can see stairs that lead down and into a basement chamber that has a sand pit surrounded by brick. There are a series of wooden training dummies and various training accoutrements. There are chains hanging from the ceiling for lifting and climbing exercises. There is a basic set of weapons against the weapon rack and a basic set of armor on the other set.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Muscle-ups.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rope climbs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we really about to pretend to do Crossfit? Is that a thing that's actually about to happen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a big thing that says WoD on it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wizard of the Day?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The minute we get downstairs, I start pawing into the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (a phone dings)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, how did you do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you grab?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, just this cleaning utensil, is all. Are we by ourselves? Nobody else came down, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the two of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I just wanted to do some cleaning with this broom that I--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But this is where you train.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can train over there on those dummies, and I can just sweep up some of this sand that's around in this area right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought we were going to train. I thought we were going to fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Well, Trinket actually wanted some training with his cannonball. If you will stand still so he can run into you a few times, that would be swell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like there's a problem with this idea, but I'm not sure what it is, so I do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket comes along with you and, in a very confused manner, attempts to train with you for a short time. It's been a while since you wrestled a bear, so it's kind of fun at times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's fun, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, I know I usually hit back, but apparently your mum thinks you can cannonball into me, so give it a go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go ahead and try, Trinket!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket backs up (bear growling), looks over at you again like, "Are you sure?" Across the sand flooring into a giant rolling attack towards you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be... What's Trinket's attack bonus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, God, you're really doing it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, that's the point of this, to get Trinket to run into you is the point. His attack bonus is plus eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus eight, that's a 23 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and take seven points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're knocked prone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Okay. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Trinket rams into you, and you hold firm and flex. Conversely, the giant bear bounces off, stumbles back onto Trinket's butt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was pretty good! I liked it a lot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Licks you right along the face, beard cowlicks up a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do I get it to stay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While all that is going on, I have a broom in my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start climbing all over the walls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put it between my legs and try to sit on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is one of your servants named Broom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I jump in the air a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I say, up! Fly! Lift up! Fatty Arbuckle! Shenanigans! Ren and Stimpy, I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rotisserie chicken!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck! Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps it requires a bad Irish accent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you usually yell when you clean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans) I put the broom on the ground. I walk over and I punch Grog as hard as I can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was that for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, it's not very strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not. I'm pretty fucking weak.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I know, but I like to make her feel good about it. Ow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry I hurt you, Grog, I know that was a very strong punch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look at Trinket and wink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you guys good? Do you want to keep training?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing! I put the fucking broom back in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You didn't clean very much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I figured the servants can do it. I walk upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can Scanlan cast Sad Trombone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a music room. I actually have a trombone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sad trombone sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Vex not there, Trinket gets a little antsy and eventually your training session with Trinket comes to an end as Trinket goes to seek Vex. You can finish your wall climbing in solace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I'm good for the night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wanted that cow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go find Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm eating food.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eating food.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Relaxing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! Actually-- no, I don't want to talk to you. Keyleth. What do you know about magical things? Like a lot?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not great at identifying what they are. I can generally be like, that's magical! But I don't know arcane things, only natural-based magics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fuck. Thank you so much!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything I can help you with, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan! I might need to talk to you, dear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we retire to my room for this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why, yes, we should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (excited gasp) I was not expecting that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth just picks up her plate and awkwardly leaves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go get the broom from the Bag of Holding again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I run up to my room to make sure that everything's neat. Light a bunch of candles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I follow him up and knock on the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (creak)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm lying in bed. Black satin sheets. Oh, I forgot you were coming!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. Well, darling. I shut the door behind me. I have a favor to ask you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should warn you, we're not alone. And I look over to the five musicians and I ask them to strike up a little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A gentle classical piece with a small, low-timbre brass section comes in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Little bossa nova.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's nice. It's not too involved, doesn't distract you too much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's nice mood setting, I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whatever. It's, you know, it's my special place where I like to come and think about philosophy and life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so smart. I've always thought that about you, that you're very smart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, many people do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I sit down next to him on the bed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gulps) It goes up and down a bit. It's a water bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cozy. Help me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we see that before?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe. Okay, Scanlan, I'm a terrible person, I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I took a broom from a poor, poor dragonborn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You took Gern's magical broom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my gods.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I'm sorry, I know, I'm terrible, and now it won't work and it was pointless and I want it to work. Help me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because it flies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because it flies, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it with you and flying?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, there's just something about being up there in the air that makes me feel alive in a way that I've never felt before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could make you fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Wait-- Oh, you mean. With your cube.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, that's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'd rather you do it with this broom, actually. And not in any weird way, just to be able to help me make the broom fly. Do you know how to do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will try. I will examine the broom and make some sort of check on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's not good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should've come to me for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Okay. Looking over the broom, you can tell it's enchanted. There are runes along the sides of the broom. You do gather from the nature of the enchantment that it is an item that requires a spoken phrase from the wielder to initiate its magic. Short of an Identify spell, you would probably have to guess. If you know the Identify spell, that would be a way for you to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't. Can I examine it to see if there's any markings, any hidden anything on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Investigation. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice that many of the runes intricately carved on the side of the broom are-- they're part of the enchantment; however, there is a certain phrase that is not part of the enchantment. It's scrawled into and very cleverly hidden amongst the broom. It is not Common. What languages do you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Common, Gnome. Pig Latin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is not a language you recognize.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I speak Elvish, Draconic, Undercommon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't see the words, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you saw it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's some words here that might be a clue to the code word. Basically, we need to find the code word. What do we know about Gern?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I tried Fatty Arbuckle. I thought maybe that was something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you try the others? Coral? Carol?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Coral. Carol.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You probably need to hold it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the... Oh. Coral! Carol! I don't remember the other one's name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stimpy? Was it Stimpy? It was Stimpy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Try: On Coral! On Carol! On Stimpy! On Fatty Arbuckle!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, but what does the word say? Where's the word?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't read the words.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I find it? What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you point it out to her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I point it out to her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is Draconic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's archaic Draconic. It's from the base root of the language, which is one of the oldest languages in civilization. It spells out, phonetically, the word for candle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's smart. (hacking spit)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, the broom jumps up in your hands, and almost lifts you off the bed for a second, and you catch it and hold it back down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Something has changed within me! Oh my God! Oh my God. Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Weirdly, you are not the first floating chick I've had in my bed. But that is amazing! You're flying!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I owe you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. You owe me nothing. That's what friends are for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I shake her little elf hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a pretty big elf hand compared to your tiny gnome hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sit on it. How high are the ceilings in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How high are the ceilings in your room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As high as they can be on the top floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's so garish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I sit side-saddle on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (hacking spit) I don't remember how I said it before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to have to remember that now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Better write that down. (hacking spit)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why didn't I choose something more fun to say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to D&D. As the words emit from your mouth, the broom takes off, and you have to aim it a bit. You start going around in circles, slowly rising up towards the roof of the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay, this is awesome! I'm really high!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I instruct the band to start playing Flight of the Bumblebee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whistling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh! Can I take my hands off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, and you start going, "Whoa!" Go ahead and make a dexterity check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God. I probably should have been lower to the ground when I said that. Okay, that's fine. Oh, I'm still exhausted!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're getting the hang of it. It's still not something you're used to, but it's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I point it down towards the ground and get lower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. And you take a few minutes to figure out the pitch and wobble of it, and it's less of a directional flight, more than it is a combination of how you hold the front of the broom and concentrate on its direction. But nevertheless, a few moments pass, and you get the hang of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. My. God. This is the best day of my entire life.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You look great up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you should not have stolen that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I know, I know, it's terrible!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was our friend! He helped us!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How bad of a person am I? I'm a horrible person!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should do something to repay the debt!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I tried. I was going to give him a lot of dragon scales, and he wandered away!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't possibly find him now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, how do I help him? Because I feel terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we can't help him, you're going to have to help someone else to make up for the lost karma.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will help as many people as I can while I'm flying through the air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perhaps I will pick someone for you to help someday. To repay us both.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that's a deal, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I will mark that down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you, like, a hag now? I sit on it, and I open the door, and I fly through the doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She drifts out of the room. The door (slam) shuts behind her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to be one of those Segway assholes now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, totally!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You lean back in your bed, on your fine, black silken sheets, with Flight of the Bumblebees still blaring by the fireplace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, guys, it didn't work, you can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fireplace still crackling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's nice in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sitting wherever there's a lounge of any kind. I'm working in the sketchbook. Working on things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a worry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be reading my alchemy book, because I have had so little time to catch up on my reading.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We never talk anymore, do we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We never do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so happy! It's the best!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to sleep. It's going to be really, really hard because I'm so excited, but I really need to get some rest!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you feed the dog?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Today? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, anyone want to do anything else? You going to go rest for the evening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You all eventually find your ways to your rooms, happy and comfortable in the fact that no one has to take watch for this night. As you all get to bed, a few hours into the evening, Keyleth, you are just starting to doze off when you hear a knock at the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps awake) Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You open the door?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On my door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On your door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keyleth, it is Cerkonos. Please open up. I wish to speak with you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I open the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Cerkonos comes in. The first thing you notice-- previously, you had seen what was his burned-off arm at the shoulder. You can now see the flesh is extended and is currently very slowly in the process of regenerating his lost arm. And it catches you off-guard for a moment, and he puts his hand up and says, "Sorry, it is not very presentable." And he still keeps his hand over it, slightly embarrassed by the mid-regenerative state of it. "I'm sorry to have disturbed you, I come as "unease has taken my mind." And he enters the room and closes the door behind him. "May we sit?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course, please, Cerkonos.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sits down. "I would not speak with those I do not "trust. And I have seen your purity of soul, Keyleth. So I come to you with these concerns." His eyes trail off for a moment in the distance, and he gathers his thoughts and his words. "Four "years ago, a young woman came to Pyrah for redemption. A lost girl, cast out and wishing for "acceptance. We, as we do with outcasts, took her in, taught her. And in time, called her one of our "own, one of the Pyrah. In recent months, she began to grow distant, taking to staying in the "Cindergrove unattended for days at a time. One afternoon, the mountain moved, angry with shifting "fires. We felt a disturbance in the Gate, and when we went to investigate, there she was, commanding "powers we did not know she had."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What kind of powers? Beyond those of druidic nature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These were the magics taken by man who defied the gods. These were the purest of ancient arcane "threads. We watched as she reached out and tore open the Gate. She laughed as we called out to "stop. But something terrible emerged from that wounded sky."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thordak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This dragon you speak of, yes. I defended all that I could, but the power was too great, and "unconsciousness took me. I awoke to my people in tatters, the fires untethered, and this terrible "girl gone. It is both embarrassing and greatly alarming that we could be infiltrated by such an "entity. That blame falls on me, as the headmaster, for not seeing this earlier."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You acted within the good nature of our people, there's nothing wrong with that. How old was this girl when she came to you? And how old is she now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When she came to us she couldn't be more than 15."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So she's 19, 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps. She did not seem to blossom into womanhood as many do. We considered her more of a "runt of her litter, if you will."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what was her race?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She seemed human."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She seemed human? What do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not know her true nature."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was her name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you have an instinct, follow it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you referring to something in particular, Cerkonos?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just do not wish you to make the same mistake I did. Anyway, I thank you for your "companions and you coming to our aid. It shall not be forgotten."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I shall keep an ear open for the name Raishan. If I hear anything about her, I'll send word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will make a fine leader."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Cerkonos. And I'm glad that you're still with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kaitiaki, Keyleth."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kaitiaki, Cerkonos.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cerkonos leaves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I start poring through my notes for the name Raishan, because Keyleth believes she has heard that name before as one of the dragons, correct? One of the white--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) It's the green one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: --the green one. Okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have any other reference, would I know anything else about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it seemed the name belonged to the green dragon that initiated the assault where you guys were.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, these thoughts echoing through your mind--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Streets will run green with revenge!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, they will!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog. You fall into a deep snore, heavy, heavy snore, after drinking the wine, climbing up walls, you've had an exhausting day of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sleeping in the sand pit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you are face down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a beach, just (snore).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's great. You've drooled into the sand, and it's clustered around your beard. It's horrifying. But in the middle of snoring, this restful sleep also comes into your mind, and you find yourself walking alone. A long hallway, into blinding light. You have to cover your face, it's so bright, but you push forward because you know there's only one way to go. You cannot see, but you can hear around you and sense the hallway's ended, and there's now space around you. You cannot see, but you sense an arena, gladiatorial in nature. You can hear the distant whisper and hum of crowds cheering.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Phillip! Phillip!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense others around you, closing in suddenly. A voice, ever-whispering in your ear, says, "Release me." Still blinded, eyes closed, on instinct, you pull the cold, dark blade from your back and swing wide, over and over again, feeling the shuddering shock of each impact, your strength matched by the razor-like edge of your weapon, cleaving down any who would approach. The high of adrenaline is incredible, and you laugh aloud at the sheer thrill of your own power.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs triumphantly)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, as you all eventually come to in the morning, having your evening's rest, you've recovered your hit points, your spells, all of the usual good stuff, in a fantastic mansion. Maybe not the most fantastic rest for some of you, but a fantastic mansion. You all eventually find your way to the breakfast nook, which is as extravagant as you would imagine a Scanlan-based breakfast nook would be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Green marble, silver tiling. Sorry, carry on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Crystal chandelier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Waffle presses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a fantastic breakfast feast already prepared, rows of servants along the walls waiting eagerly to attend to you guys as you sit down, pouring fresh juices. It smells fantastic, and most of you look rested, except for a handful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eat! Drink!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come skipping into the room, for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're looking delighted and delightful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a beautiful day it is!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have wine and ale at the breakfast buffet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure. There's mimosas, there's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll have a mimosa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've never heard of breakfast beer?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Breakfast beer? Sure. There's milk from a cow with a broken nose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that is so sad. Can you heal it? Can it be healed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'll be fine. When we leave this place, all these people die, anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're supposed to churn the milk after it leaves the cow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Scanlan, can we store things here, or does it all disappear as soon as we leave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't tried it before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should leave something inconsequential.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll leave Trinket, and then we'll try it again, and if Trinket's still here, we'll know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Schrodinger's Trinket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just-- no?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. We'll leave the broom and see if it's still here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, let's not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What broom?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Vex, is there something you'd like to admit to the rest of the group? They'll see you use it sooner or later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a voice go (grunt). Trinket's over there, face covered in breakfast food, trying to sit at one of the edges of the table like a person, the actual bowing of the wooden bench that Trinket's on, you hear the creaking as he moves around in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, guess what! I can fly! A-plus!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did that happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I had a really weird night, too. What happened in your... because, I mean, flight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you have a weird night? Do you want to tell us about it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I want to hear about your night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you go first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to learn how you fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So I sort of kind of tricked Gern, I'm a terrible person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gern, our friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You swallowed that last part. What did you say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: took something that wasn't mine? In a way. I mean, I was holding on to it, and then I slipped, and it fell into the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why is that bad?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You stole from a candlemaker?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stole from a necromancer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Slash candlemaker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. No, he was a nice guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we should hear Vax's opinion of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax, I think you were a bad influence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't judge. I've done my share in the past. I thought you were a little overly nice to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, to be fair, we did steal a carpet once.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we steal that? I thought it was just a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We used that in an emergency.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We commandeered it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We took it, Scanlan, and we didn't tell Allura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then never gave it back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think any of us can judge you, Vex'ahlia, but it does strike me as a little bit odd, if nothing else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. I know, I'm afraid these rogue tendencies I've been learning from you, brother, maybe rubbed off a little bit. No, I just, I know I shouldn't have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't care.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to return it right away, and then he wandered off. That's a lie, I didn't want to return it. But I did want to pay him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think you wanted to do that either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I did! I did, I wanted to pay him! But he wandered away, and then I didn't pay him, and now I have this broom that I stole, and there's really no way to return it. Well, I probably could find him, but I don't want to because now I can fly, you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you going to re-gift it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I'm going to keep it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you say, Percy? I think it's kind of funny.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you honestly asking my opinion? You said what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, Percy, do you know-- I know you can build things and make things wonderful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you show me? What is this thing, what did you steal? What is this thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out the broom and I lift up in the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch as Vex all of a sudden (whoosh) takes off above the breakfast room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sweet!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty badass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if I approve of the metaphor, but that's--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happens when you shoot a couple arrows from up there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, shoot me with an arrow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, shoot some arrows!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, you're not holding onto the broom anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I've been practicing! I've been practicing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach on the table and I grab what I'm sure is a whole chicken sitting there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I hold it up and I go--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has it not occurred to you that you're not going to be able to fly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, look! I'm not holding on, Percy! Look at me, not holding on!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, Vex, ready? Ready, Vex? Vex?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, dear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trust.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Watch your eyes. Watch your eyes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trust Vex!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Laura, I want you to go ahead and, first, roll a dexterity check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Shut up! 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You catch yourself and just barely manage to pull back and fire. I want you to go ahead and roll an attack with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, man, disadvantage. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Please, god, may your aim be true today, Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. (impact) The arrow does get relatively close to your hand, but it does stick into the turkey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She did it! I hand the chicken to Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I start eating.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull the arrow out of the chicken.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do it again! And I throw the chicken closest to me into the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A moving target!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make another dexterity check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's lots of chickens, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit balls. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Okay, this time, you start falling off and you catch yourself entirely. The arrow just goes wide, you don't even get a chance to nock it in the bow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mother bitch, I really need to work on this! Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll take some practice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think this is-- this may be an engineering issue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, Percy, this is the thing. Can you build a seat on this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull out my notepad and start sketching.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you could build a seat, and then I can sit on it instead of trying to sit on this tiny little stick?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tinker?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tinker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, beyond it being an engineering issue, it might be a greed issue first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How's that mimosa treating you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's phenomenal. It's been a long few weeks. I don't care. I don't care. We're never going to see Gern again. I have so many other things to care about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no, she's day drunk again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, are you already drunk, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! I'm just, it's been a long few-- Look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Jesus!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't care anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many was that? Just one, right? We've been here for five minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I float down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! I just don't want you to die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I float down eye-level, but I'm still floating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want you to die. I don't want you to die because of your greed. I don't care that you have-- You look amazing. Doesn't she look amazing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a real hoverboard, is there a chance this one might set on fire as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are you trying to be an asshole?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing, Keyleth. I'm not afraid to die anymore. I came to this realization. I've seen the other side. I've come to terms with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that's phenomenal that you've come to terms with it! I don't know about the rest of us in the room that all watched you die, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel too guilty to say no to her. I'm perfectly content to let this go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is pretty sweet, flying around like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty wonderful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's really cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's an adult. Deep levels of arrested development, but an adult nonetheless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't care about the broom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, Vex swore to me that she would only use it for good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. I'm not going to steal anything while I'm riding on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where would you put it, anyway? You can't let go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just don't get into trouble, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll practice as much as I can, and Percy's going to help me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I can be stable on this thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may need some money, but we'll put something together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will give you all the money you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you going to carry that on your back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'll look like a Byroden chimney sweep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I feel so good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got out, you came out on top this time. It might not happen next time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start eating while sitting on the broom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I think she's listening to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you broke through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you're learning to let people be people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't care anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, look, look! Another round of chickens has just arrived for us to eat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, chicken!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what breakfast is, so I just keep commanding them to make chickens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So much chicken, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where should we head to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is our next-- Shoot, I kept a to-do list for us, but I didn't bring it tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (burps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I thought you were going to say something. That was a belch?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you want to head back to-- Actually, Keyleth, you said something weird happened last night for you as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Cerkonos stopped by.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah? I look at my brother. All right, cool. Keep going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not... As my elder. He stopped by as my respected elder. Do you all remember the name Raishan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's one of the dragons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently she's our little infiltrator.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She came to the Fire Ashari, she came to Pyrah, about four years ago, and the Ashari, being the adoptive people that we are, they took her in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They adopted a dragon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They adopted a dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do they think she's the one who sabotaged the rift?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They do. They were unaware that she was a dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that make her the leader or something? Is that how all the dragons got through? I'm still not quite sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It makes her the instigator, at the very least.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It makes her fairly close to Thordak, it would seem. Apparently, when she came to the Fire Ashari, she was about 15 years old, and...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As a dragon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Visually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As a human woman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So she was making it seem like she was 15.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was making it seem like she was 15, and they started realizing that she possessed powers far beyond anything that they had seen before, and then these powers began to exceed anything beyond our druidic capabilities. And it would seem that they realized that too late.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they say anything about her goals, or motivations? Her ambitions?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cerkonos said one day they woke up and the mountain was spewing fire, and was angry with lava, and when he went to investigate it, she was there, ripping open the rift. And that was when everything happened. When he came to consciousness, everything was destroyed, so that's all he saw. And she was gone. But we know where she went next.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To Emon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, eventually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Totally. That day. The day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was trying to skip exposition, I thought you guys could fill in the blanks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We thought you had new information beyond that and would maybe want to add. It was certainly set up that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. I'll work on that next time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was very leading.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well that's good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So perhaps we should inquire if you think this-- Raishan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Raishan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has tried to pretend to be a human woman in any other place? Should we ask around, or was it just the one ruse here to gain entry for her companions?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Well, don't trust anyone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't trust anyone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Servant rushes forward, "More chicken, sir?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep it coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right away."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys have vegetables, maybe? Any vegetables?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vegetables, sir?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all chicken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Chicken it is."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. Chicken and mimosas, it's my favorite breakfast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And waffles.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, waffles too? Chicken and waffles, that's right. Maybe someone else should be in charge of the food next time we come here. My tastes are a little--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Base?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Little?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Singular.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And one thing that this does confirm is that this has been a plan that's been in the process for a very, very long time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I just came up with the chicken this morning when I woke up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are we going next, you guys?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog had some brass knuckles to get. Was that a thing? Did we get those?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. We haven't gotten those yet. But there's other things to explore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Wait, did we have to go make a trip to anyone else's homeland? How's Whitestone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to talk to a sphinx. A sphinx's boyfriend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's right. Maybe that should be our next--

lines.name: MARISHA
