lines.text: What was his name? Hang on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And what were we trying to get there? Another one of the articles of confederation?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need the Titanstone Knuckles of Kord, which Kevdak has.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's with your tribe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, but then there's the sphinx.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Time for a family reunion, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you ready for that, or do you want to put that off a bit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, no, I mean. Whenever. It's. You know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So do you want to go now, or do you want to maybe swing by somewhere?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's either that or the library, I imagine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to go to the library?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just saying that it's either that or the library.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it's Grog's herd or the sphinx to get something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll remember.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the way. And then, or, TBD, find something else to do. I guess Grog's thing is the most promising. We know that there's Knuckles there, we know that there's people we'll know there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's all actually around Westruun, right? Aren't your people around Westruun?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, they roam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we have to find them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Last time we ran into them, wasn't it on the way to Kraghammer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From Westruun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Odessa's mate is south of the Frostweald.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it was. On the way to Kraghammer, that's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Frostweald near Kraghammer as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Frostweald is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: South of Westruun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: South of Westruun, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So let's make our way to Westruun, I suppose, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that's in the direction of both Grog's herd and the Frostweald?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially? Well, Grog would know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool. Yes, I think Grog really wants to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we should probably go there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your herd wanders all across the Silvercut Roadway, that whole area to the west of Westruun, south of Kraghammer, east of Emon, that vicinity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They wander there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Around there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me, and then a lot of other me's, and they're all really big and angry. So if we want to do anything else before that happens--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You think they'll attack us? But we're with you! You're our ally!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and I'm a super cool, awesome, fun guy, but we didn't really leave in the best terms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, weren't you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ass-kicked, yeah. All left for dead, pretty much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why exactly were you beat up and kicked out of your herd?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They didn't like that answer. My uncle in particular, he didn't like that, so he made me fight my cousin, his son.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That wasn't bad, I handled that. It was not a problem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So they might have a grudge about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, there's no grudge. They pretty much think I'm dead, because after I whooped his son's ass, he whooped my ass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a thing for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I borrow your hat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course you can borrow my hat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Hat of Disguise?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you don't want to have an immediate confrontation with your family, there's no particular reason why they have to know you're alive yet at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could wear this hat. Might not fit on your head, you could maybe put it on one of your knuckles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not hiding from my herd.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were giving off the impression of one who is looking forward to putting something off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was, was I?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were. You're not anymore, as if you've been dared, somehow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very big.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you're too scared to do it, we can go elsewhere. Sorry, I will never say that again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm excited to go. I want to go. We should go. You know, what we need is the wolf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The wolf?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. We need--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, the wolf in Whitestone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Don't they smell shit? He could help us find them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Trinket can smell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I can also theoretically turn into a wolf to help us find things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, if you want to. I don't know how long it's been since he's seen a she-wolf, so, you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was talking as in--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, it's very generous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just out of curiosity, we weren't going to walk in and negotiate with your uncle. He's not going to give us these Knuckles. He's a proud owner of them, yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And how many are in the herd, roughly?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's a number bigger than five?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's like six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mean it's like at least six? Or possibly more than six? How fast actually is the reproduction process of goliaths?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there more people in your herd or fingers on your hand?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hold up Scanlan's hands and then I hold up my hands behind them so that all 20 fingers are waggling. Grog, are there more than this many in your herd?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's counting hands, not fingers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I hold up mine, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all hold up our hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many hands is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're doing rakshasa hands. Grog, is there more of them than rakshasa hands?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's closer, yeah. It's been a long time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this could be bad. This could be bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could attempt to steal them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Steal from the goliaths? That could work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How easy is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he wear them all the time? Does he put them in a chest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, they're pretty smart, they're like me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. You're right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think it's going to be pretty no matter what we do, but I actually think trying to steal them might be a better angle than going toe-to-toe with "six" goliaths. I just did air quotes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If six is the right number.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here's the thing, though. Normally, if you try and steal something, or if you try and break the rules and you're like Keyleth and you get arrested every time, arrested ain't so bad. They don't really arrest you. They, like, open you up and use you as an appetizer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As a hat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. That was my thing, though. So I'm a little nervous about that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just have to pick the least terrible option right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we need these vestiges. We cannot do anything without these vestiges.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It seems to me that no matter where we go, we are putting ourselves in peril.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it's really just a question of which peril do we want to face first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And don't we theoretically need the vestiges before we go visit Odessa's boyfriend?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought Odessa's boyfriend had a vestige.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he has locations of other vestiges.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Odessa? Osysa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Osysa.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Odessa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like Pike would want to come with us, Grog. You're very dear to her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But wasn't Pike and her grandfather the reason?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was Pike's grandfather, yeah. And plus, she's a healer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the very least, let's make our way to Westruun, then. Let's get that far and see what's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, remember Westruun is under dragons right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can instantly transport anywhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know of trees outside of Westruun?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can, but it's under dragon reign. In fact, isn't that where Raishan stopped off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the scrying that you saw was Umbrasyl, the black dragon, that took up residence, it seems, in Gatshadow, the mountain north of Westruun, at the base of the Cloudkeep mountain range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Gatshadow is where Grog got his scar, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, that's where you guys initially... that happened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Fuck. Look, if there's a lot of them, and only a handful of us, it's not usually customary to have two sides go at each other. If we want those Knuckles, I'm pretty sure it might have to be one on one. Now, I know I can totally take my uncle. But I wouldn't mind if we found a few extra-credit items before we did that just in case I have the flu that morning, or it burns when I pee. Just something to take the edge off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So sphinx first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If that's what you want to do, then yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Say no more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. And did we also want to check out the Cobalt Reserve which was in Westruun, or did Allura already handle that and we're cool?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura, I think, handled that, right? You saw her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was there and it looked pretty trashed. It looked like she grabbed a lot of the last of the good things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's that? The Frostweald, we've been there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we have been to the Frostweald.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you remember any trees there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Frostweald is where Grog mugged down with the nymph, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Allegedly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allegedly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll never know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog does not kiss and tell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All the time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All the time. All the time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just not that one time that we want to actually know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go to the Frostweald.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you remember any trees?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I remember any trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the time, because you were not specifically paying attention to this ability of yours, there is no specific tree that has caught your attention. You could attempt to make an intelligence roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not my strong suit. A straight intelligence check? Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been a long time since then, and you weren't being conscious of it at the time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been a few years, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All trees look the same, don't they?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: After a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Say it. All trees look the same.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Everybody hop on Vex's broom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we could try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could get us close, or I could scry and look for a tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you would like to, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take time to do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, yeah. The trees in the area that you would know, that you recall, there was a... There were trees based around the Crossroads, which is the middle point of the Silvercut roadway that's even further northwest, and west of Westruun. There's the Bramblewood Forest, which is just north of Westruun. Most of them would be further west from there. Those are the closest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The closest destination. Would the Crossroads be good? Maybe get us to the Crossroads?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could just go to Westruun. Is Westruun still there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Westruun's under dragon rule. There's an actual dragon on Westruun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not on. Up in the mountain, but watching down, probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they've got wyverns policing, right, in Westruun?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't notice in your scry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to assume. Let's do the Crossroads.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it! Let's do it! Let's do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could theoretically run into your herd, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, I hope we do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To the Crossroads!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're going to the Crossroads. The Crossroads is about two days of travel northeast of the Frostweald, about three days' travel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I would be going northeast from the Crossroads? Or if I wanted to go in the Bramblewood I would have to southwest to get to the Frostweald?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is Kraghammer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's the Bramble forest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's right here. It's by Westruun. The Crossroads is over here. You can totally take the Crossroads, but it'll be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go to the forest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go to the forest. Let's go to the Bramblewood forest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bramblewood forest? Okay, that's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's got to be some big trees there. I remember a few big trees. I remember admiring a few big trees in the Bramblewood forest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you spent a lot of time in Westruun, specifically, you do recall various locations. You take a moment to concentrate on a few trees actually within Westruun. You recall there was one that was near a playground where you had once interrogated a small child if they had seen--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah! I remember that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We spent a whole day in that park.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. You begin to cast the spell and you concentrate on that tree in the park. There's no connection to the tree. You gather that the tree may not have survived the initial attack on Westruun. However, you do take a moment and you do recall at the entrance to the Bramblewood, when you guys were briefly attacked by that group of thieves that were pulling you off to the side, pretending to be a stranded caravan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was a series of rather large trees that marked the roadway there, and you recall one that had distinct markings, and you do manage to find a point of concentration or connection there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess it took me a moment to find signal. Okay. All right. We're good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You need a signal boost.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I got one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all rush through one after the other, Trinket jumping behind. You all make it through, and you're now standing on the central pathway of the Bramblewood. Further south, you're probably about an hour and a half foot travel before you exit the southern portion of the forest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, sorry, guys, this is as close as I could get us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, this is great!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And how far are we now? A day's travel? Two days' travel, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the Frostweald? You're about a day and a half. On horseback you're about a day, under a day. On foot, you're looking at about two days' travel, a little over two days' travel.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a rapid pace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mist form.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or we go where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could be clouds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not very fast in mist form, are we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we are, we're super fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fast in mist form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long would it take to get us in mist form?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be a little bit faster than a horse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we turn into clouds and go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't done this before. Is it freaky?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pop Trinket back into his little crystal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it super freaky?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's so super freaky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, what if instead of a seat, what if it was like I was straddling it, and there were two little things like footholds?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry, do you want to design this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, it's up to you. It's totally you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was just coming up with ideas to help you out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're welcome to design this, it's just going to be much more expensive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, it's all you. It's all you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Keyleth, what are you doing? Are you doing the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm picking my spells because I haven't done that yet, but yeah. We'll poof!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Keyleth goes ahead and casts-- Is it Wind Walk?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wind Walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you guys take a moment to transform into a mist form, and you all begin to coast right around the top of the trees, making your way south to the back of the Bramblewood. As soon as you exit the top of the trees, you can see Westruun ahead of you, and there are a number of interesting things that catch your attention. First and foremost, you see, halfway between the treetops to the south end of the forest and the very north part of Westruun, there appears to be a large, green open field with thicker patches of grassland here and there. There is a section that is a grassless dirt mound, that has, as you start coasting over you can see, what looks like spikes of wood, a couple of things that glimmer in the light as you pass over, and what looks like large grooves dug in a haphazard pattern. This patch is about 15 or 20 feet across, and you see two people bringing a cart away from it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we mist down a little closer to get a better view of what it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. These wispy people-clouds (wind).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those clouds look like half-elves!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one seems to pay mind. The two individuals that went away with the cart are a little far from what you can see at this point, but they both appear to be humanoid, in no particular rush but they're hauling this large cart away. As you look, you can see in this patch of dirt, the glimmers that you saw was a smattering of gold and silver coins that appear to have been tossed into this pile. It looks like there are pieces of wood that have been broken and crushed in the giant grooves. Who's taking the intense look at this one right now? Okay, so the two of you, I want you to roll investigation checks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. No, 16 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recognize, and you get a feel for it too, because of your specialty in this, you notice that the giant grooves that tear into this are actually sweeping claw marks, like something of a large size and a very fast speed came down, and has come down multiple times, to snatch up something that was placed in this location.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is where they make their offerings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is where the offerings are made.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good to know. I have advantage on anything having to do with dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, which, as you're seeing this now, yeah, you would gather the information with him as you did. Do you guys continue southward?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coasting on the outskirts of the city?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's good to know that that's there, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could set an ambush later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to coast around the outside of Westruun, drifting up above as well, this wispy pattern of clouds. You get a view of the external farmlands that dot the north-northwestern side of Westruun. A number of them appear to have been burned. Not like forest fire or cataclysmic meteorite, like intentionally burned. The crops are charred and black, and there's a pattern to how that was set. A few farmhouses also appear to have burned as well. But there are farmlands that are also functional, and you can see people tilling the land. I want everyone to make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perception.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also notice that the outside of the city, there appears to be some sort of construct or battlements, almost like another wall, a very thin wall, has been built around the various entrances to the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They've imprisoned the people. We can't talk to each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't talk to each other, no, not in mist form.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just vape at each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we keep going, or do we-- Somebody make a choice. Down or keep going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what good we'll do right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't do anything right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're the only two that have noticed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you guys. Do you guys want to go investigate, or do you want to keep going south?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, how many guards are there around there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You only see two that are actually in the immediate farmland, and they're quite a walk away from the actual city. They don't appear to be on heavy lockdown.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As wind, I'll pull in front of my sister and use windiness and wind hands and wind farts to put up a stop sign with my hands and point down if that's possible in this form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's possible in the form. Vex, you see Vax, your brother, stop in front of you, put his hands up, and point downward with his hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you want to do? What do you want? I noticed it too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I float on over to this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go down and I'm going to motion for her to follow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, going down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all follow?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll solidify on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still thinking about, what were those big gashes in the ground back there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was really confusing to you. All right, you guys all drift down towards the ground as you see Vax begin to take on physical form on the outskirts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit. Can we stealth? As we come out of it, I want to cast Pass Without a Trace immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Are you going down to the burnt farmland or one of the healthy farms?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we go down in an area that there's shadow, to where we're hidden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few of the fields that are more high crop, corn-style stalks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somewhere that when we take form, we'll be hidden.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just you two, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going down, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Percy, Vax, and Vex all take a moment to revert back to their physical form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm reverting, too. I'm a follower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Scanlan. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, we're just going to make this super obvious, huh? There are dragons flying overhead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we've landed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're in a corn field.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we've landed. Let's do it. We all want to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so all of you, including Grog, or are you staying in your mist form?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck it. Let's do it. I'm changing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all take a moment to revert to your physical form. I would like everyone to make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I cast Pass Without a Trace, so it's extra ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! Natural 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, 18!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Add ten!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't know we're here anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where'd the party go? You all begin to weave your way through the various lines of high-stalk crop. Where are you heading? Are you heading in towards the city, or are you heading towards the farmers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just want to sit here for a minute and talk about it. Can we just say, so here's the thing. Those guards are attacking the farmers. I'm pretty sure they're using slave labor at this point. Kind of like you, Scanlan! Slave labor to provide food for the city. Vax really wanted to stop down, but the thing is, if we kill the guards and set the farmers free, everybody in the city might starve. It's a tough situation right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or they might just send more guards, once they know that one's been killed, and then kill everybody involved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm afraid right now I don't know what all we can do in this town until we can defeat the dragon, which unfortunately is rather close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a bigger problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't do anything for them right now until we actually know what's happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, you can see there's a slight rustle, and a farmer comes across, carrying a small satchel as he's picking things off of one of the nearby areas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he close to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 15 feet from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he see us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't seem to notice you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we can tell him to hold out hope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe he knows what's going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could also be one of the assholes that's serving the dragon, just like people in Emon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go (clicks).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a man in his late 40s, early 50s, gray beard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shh! Help me out. Shh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah..."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Act natural!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep picking!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep picking!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He keeps picking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you. Do you like the dragon or do you not like the dragon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the interest of the internet, we should probably do stage whispers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you like the dragon or do you not like the dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there's some heavy bruising on his face and part of his cheek is swollen. He goes, "It would be hard around these parts to find someone who likes a dragon, let alone that one."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not the worst of the worries right now, though."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the worst?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The ones who work for him."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. So you have to provide food for everybody living in the city? Is that how that goes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Every one of them. Otherwise they just go ahead and steal from whoever's nearby. Isn't a "caravan that's made their way past Westruun in the past week."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, here's the thing. We're trying to help you. We're trying to find a way to (clicking) (choking) kill the fucks. You get me? Ill-kay the agons-dray.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drops the fruit he has in his hand. "Please! Please help us, please!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Act natural! Keep picking, keep picking, keep picking! We want to help you. We really, really, really want to help you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They have my daughter."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's in charge?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who has your daughter?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No daughters right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those beasts."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beasts? What beasts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guards? They're keeping your daughter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keeping a lot of people."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know where they keep them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans over, nudges towards the direction of the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's in charge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know his name."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that spot that we saw, just outside of town, that's where gold is given to the dragon? Do you know anything of that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They just take what we have."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The guy, you don't know his name. What does he look like? Where have you seen him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep your voice down!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm talking through Skype, so it's a little more difficult for me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who are you talking about?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The guy who's got your child. You don't know his name. What does he look like? Where have you seen him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. They're all different types, I haven't seen the one who has them. They have them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They, the guards? The people that serve the dragon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What type of people are they interested in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Half-orcs-- Interested in? Whoever keeps him at bay. I don't know, they take whoever seems "useful. Sometimes they take them and slaughter them before us as a warning."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then why did they take your daughter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't want to think about it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To keep him working!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where would you go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He points over to the city. "But there's one right out..." And you see him pointing angrily around the corner, probably to the one that you saw on the outskirts of the farm area you guys came down in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go to the city then, I suppose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a dragon!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To do what, to attack half-orcs that work for a dragon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Farmer. What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Reginald."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Reginald. Reginald, we want to help. How often do you see the dragon flying around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Once every couple days, maybe."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Once every couple days. When was the last time you saw him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "About half a day ago. Dusk yesterday. I don't know. We all stay inside around that time "just in case."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he have patrols? Does he have wyverns working for him as well, that fly around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't seen anything flying but the dragon. There was a huge fight not more than a "week ago between these people and that thing. They seem to have come to an accord."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: These people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The orcs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The orcs, the whatever they are. The big strong angry ones that keep taking all of our stuff."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do they look like?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they look like him, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Some do."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck, fuck, fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The dragon came in and tore everything down."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it. Shit hammer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Both of them."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good luck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, wait, wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we have to keep going. We can't face these goliaths and dragons and orc guards! This is craziness!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One of the dragons was green?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From what we saw."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Green and a black.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Green and a black. I think a white one, but that one kept going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the green one kept going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All of them kept going. We thought we were safe. We tried to re-gather. And then, within a "day, a bunch of these bastards came and took what was left. Slaughtering, stealing."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got to go get his kid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we have to help them. We have to help them!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man. I feel like you all are talking like I normally do, and I'm talking like Grog normally does. This is such a weird day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you're using way too many prepositions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said there are a lot of people that look like me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From what I've seen. I don't go too far into town, they keep me out here, but I've seen a few."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye out for the guard. I want to keep an eye out for the guard, make sure he's not noticing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're in the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most of them are, yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were there six of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, okay. You don't see the guard nearby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need that guard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we going to do right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to ask him some questions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is a coup on a grander scale than Whitestone that we're talking about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want the guard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's the guard? Can we see him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys want to try and find him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I saw him on the other side of the thingie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys begin making your way towards the direction that Vex saw the guard. You start pushing through the crop, making your way to the edge, and at the point where these high crops end, it opens up into what looks like a heavy root-based field. Potatoes, carrots, things that are beneath the ground. You guys see across the way the two other farmers that were out there, the one that you saw being loosely beaten, they're both filling satchels and emptying them into two larger carts that are put up to horses, one of them a larger pony. You see what appears to be another hulking humanoid, taller than an average person, skin slightly gray, a smattering of tattoos across the body. You recognize--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And best we can tell, he's the only guard? The only one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, there's two. There's two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have an idea!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, he was about to tell us who it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can see, you actually recognize this individual.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking nipple tassels!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is an individual that you knew quite a ways ago, a young goliath who was still about a half a foot shorter than you when you knew him. He was named Horace, because he hated it, and Kevdak gave him this name and you actually, at some point in the past, recall even giving Horace a good beating. A little of the smaller of the goliaths you've encountered. This is years later. This punk kid, and he was kind of a punk, has grown up now, and is still smaller than you by a size, but still seems to be every bit of an agitating little bitch you remember, from the way that he's treating these people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he holding anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in his hand at the moment, no, but he does have across the back what looks to be some sort of large blade sheathed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I give my idea?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we ask Reginald to call for help, like he needs this fuck's help, and then he comes over, and then we spring a trap on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not a bad idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can use Hide in Plain Sight on us, and hide us, and make us look like we're part of the crops.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To set an ambush.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the goal is to question this guy or to take him out? To question, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to ask him questions, and if he makes a peep-- Hold on, before we do that. Can you see the other guard that was out here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about, because it is a pretty open area, you can see the secondary guard is walking away, looking to check one of the other homesteads. There is a farmhouse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like Kansas, right, it's flat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, it's flat farmland on the outside of Westruun. As soon as you break the south side of the Bramblewood, it's just plain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What distance would you put him at? How far away would you put him? 100 yards?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The other guard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say the other guard's probably a good 400 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take a minute to camouflage us and then tell Reginald to call him over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When he comes over, I grab him. Nobody do anything that's loud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, as you all take a moment, stepping into parts of the stalks of the edge of this land, Vex, you go ahead and start taking up leaves, patches of dirt, mud from freshly watered ground, and you start smattering the rest of the group with it. You guys are going full Arnold from Predator. You begin to blend into the vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Question. Could I work with Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have Entangle learned today. Could we fashion a quick Entangle trap, where when the guy steps into it he'll be entangled? Or I could maybe just be prepared for it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can be prepared for it when it happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be prepared for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to draw her a little sketch of something that would spring, that you can make out of wood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell expends when cast, so it's more of waiting to release it. To make it as part of a set trap, that would be a consumable trap you would have to construct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I'll just be prepped with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you guys all have hidden.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Reginald.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's behind you guys, watching all of this happen. "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Act like you're still picking and act like you hurt your ankle, and call for help from that guard over there. We'll protect you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Promise?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I promise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And try and maybe keep a bit of a distance, because I'm going to be doing a trap here. It's going to be 20 feet. You don't want to be in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just step back and call for help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just step back, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are all working on the very edge of where these crop fields begin. Reginald pushes through a little bit, and goes, "Ow! Ow! Ow!" You hear in the distance a voice go, "Hey you! What's "your problem?" He goes, "My ankle!" And he starts hobbling into the crop. "You shut your trap! It's "your fucking ankle! What's that stupid-- Oh, you--" (grunts) He starts lumbering up. "I'm going to "teach you about letting a peep out of that stupid maw of yours! I'm going to beat that face so hard "it can't make a noise ever again! Stupid git!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whoosh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The minute he's in the high crops so he's out of visual from the other guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as soon as he steps into the high crop area.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm waiting for Percy's cue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So what are the specifics of the Entanglement spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It always works and it catches whoever you want!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It always works...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of a sudden all of the crops, all of the large stalks and vines start (whoosh) wrapping around his body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit, mother bitch!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's wrong?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a bit obvious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it obvious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's once he's inside the area, so it's not like the wall on the outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I was picturing all the plants suddenly losing their shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, just the ones in the immediate vicinity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a used car lot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so he's going to attempt to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to squat at the edge of the high crops and keep an eye on the other guard who was walking off just to make sure he's oblivious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Surprised so he has disadvantage on the saving throw. What's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19? That's a failure. All right, and what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28! Yeah, Vax, keeping an eye, the guard doesn't seem to have kept notice and continues walking off towards the distant farmhouse. The plants all wrap around his body and he: "What's this? Stupid-- "

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run over and I tackle him, knock him to the ground, put my hand over his mouth, punch him in the forehead. Punch him again. Punch him a third time. And I barely lift my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You motherfucker-- "

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Punch him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, now he's got blood pouring out of the corner of the eye. One eye has gone a little red from burst vessels. You can see it starting to swell up already. Blood's now pouring out the side of the nose where you've hit it, and he's still fighting even though the plants have kept him entangled. As soon as the calm comes to him (heavy breathing).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sing-song) Horace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eyes go wide and all the tension in the body loosens. "Fucking hell."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (muffled) Fucking hell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still holding his face? (muffled) "Fucking hell."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shut the fuck up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He spits a couple teeth out the side of his mouth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're looking big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why the fuck are you still alive?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right. Funny thing about me. So look, who else is out in this field with you right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No one. It's me and Cole, but Cole's heading back to the city. We have other ones "passed out around, but most of them stay in town, especially during the day. That's where the "festivities are."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Festivities?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you want back in? You're alive, man. Now's the time. It's a good time for the herd."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no I want back in, for sure. That's what I've come here for: to come back in. But here's the thing. It's a bit of a surprise, right? Other people haven't seen me. You like a good surprise, right, Horace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I thought you might. Here's my question: have you seen my cousin Zanror? Is he in the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably, aye."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. And what about Kevdak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kevdak stays in the city, as well. Up at the old Margrave's place, actually. Turned it into "his palace. Want me to take you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before we go any further, what do I roll if I want to find out if Horace really does like surprises? I'm not kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check. All of you guys are still hidden, by the way, unless you want to do something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm just watching.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we gained another plus ten, so now we have plus 20 to all of our stealth, by the way, from that Hide in Plain Sight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I camouflaged us fucking for.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you have all these things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you guys make another stealth check with plus 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20, so 40. Actually, I have a stealth of seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Retroactively, no one's ever seen you in your entire lives.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could fire my gun, at this point, and they'd be like, oh, rain's coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it was Bad News, it would still probably break stealth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if it was Bad News, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could take you in."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, listen. I was going to pounce on this poor farmer over here, but I saw you were obviously keeping your eye on him. Why are you doing that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which one are you talking about? Reggie?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Old Broken Foot over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but you know what? I caught him sniffing "around. I think he's keeping some gold hidden."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? Gold? This poor farmer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Twisted his arm a couple of times."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We could do this for old times' sake. Each take an arm, pull until he tells us."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, like wishbone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here's my thing. Why are you guys in this city? It's not really our thing to be in civilized places.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here's the thing. Let me get loose here for a minute. I'm feeling a bit uncomfortable."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't think I will, Horace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "More than we could ever dream of. Most of it's pretty well-guarded, but there couldn't be much "left over there. So we gathered up who we had, and mind you, the herd's swelled a bit since you left, "my friend. We conquered another wandering tribe last year. Zanror took the head of their leader "and commanded them to join. We're about a hundred strong these days."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pecking order. Still us goliaths at the top. We got all sorts of other piddly men."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We weren't so much a hundred strong then, but by the end of that we had 50 or 60 to our name before "the anger finally stopped. Kevdak bent a knee and made an offering to this dragon."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kevdak did?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Westruun is now property of the herd."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it sounds really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've missed out, and there's quite a few openings now, since we've lost a few of the less "than strong folk. You look strapping. I'm sure Kevdak would be more than happy to have you back."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do. I've actually brought a few gifts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) I notch an arrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I unsheathe Craven Edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a good blade."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Isn't it. And I ask out loud, are you hungry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been probably half a day since breakfast. Aye. Why?" His expression begins to shift as realization begins to dawn on his face.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shocked noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before he can say a word-- he tries to speak through the pain, but it's met with the gurgle as various bodily fluids fill the inside of his lungs and throat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blade, now, you can see (choking noise) peeks through the back of the mouth as his eyes go ever so dull, the rest of the blood flow pouring out the sides of his mouth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pity that, acid reflux.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog! Oh shit. Good job, there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this is happening, the blood that has filled the mouth begins to seep back into the mouth. The trails are still there, but what was once filled to the brim has been slowly recessed, swallowed. Not by the unmoving body of Horace, but the dark blade itself now drawing from the inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck is that sword, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is your sword doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing. It takes in the strength of who it slays.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It takes in the blood?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did it do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You killed him. Was he related to you in some way?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. I remember him. He was always a little shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, do you remember killing him five seconds ago?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no. You guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The little dude. Your little friend?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Horace?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You killed him. On purpose?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You wanted to?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he was going to go tell about us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were conscious of that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're using too-big words.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So listen, right? Either we stay and do some recon, or we take out the other guy that's walking back to the city. Really shouldn't be a problem. But if they're all in there, 50 strong, I don't think we're quite ready for that. The sneaky fucks in our group could go take a look, if you're feeling randy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What would be our mission?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Info only.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You killed this one quite easily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Very easily.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but that's because we did it as a group.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could we wait until nightfall?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to check out his body. See if there's any booty on his body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, as soon as we move, we won't be camouflaged in this crop anymore. We'll lose that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we won't look like crops.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the stalks unwind, leaving his defiled body and you draw the blade free, Scanlan, you find, across the body, there is a simple, slightly chipped-but-still-functional greatsword that was sheathed in the back, wrapped in a haphazard hide that functioned as a scabbard. Mostly just leather pants, a few furs, looks to be a bone necklace and a bone bracelet around the wrist which looks to be teeth, human teeth. About 27 gold pieces in total change.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far are we from the city here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a five-minute walk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five-minute walk. That's not far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, can you use your powers to suck him into the ground so that nobody sees him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I honestly don't think they're going to find him, anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use my abilities and try to camouflage the body so that nobody finds him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's pretty well-hidden.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I use my Druidcraft to grow some flowers on top of the dirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some flowers come up there. Some of the local leaves from the stalks bend down and help cover him up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Leave a couple of his human teeth that he's collected--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll leave all his human teeth, I'm not gonna take that shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Great, so very successful trip. Stopping down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Reggie?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: His partner's still long-gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That guard?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The other guard, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guard's gone. Reggie's still sitting there, watched this whole thing happen. Looking at you and goes, "You did good. You did good."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know I did. Just imagine what we'll do to the rest of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. Thank you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to do anything to the rest of them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're going to go take a look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't mind you taking a look, but

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can also still turn into mist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They can't hurt us when we're mist.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can all mist and go into the city and check it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See what we see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be fast and stealthy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we stealth while we're misting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't matter if they see us, they can't do anything to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it would be being conscious of the cloud patterns in the sky, moving with the wind in a way where you become less noticeable as something strange. So it's possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's try that, so we can spy on the city! Get closer in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It feels kind of cheap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least if we go in, Grog, we can see what we're up against.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but can't we use our eyes? Just as they are. Do we have to turn to smoke this time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why would we not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It feels a little cowardly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not cowardly, Grog, it's safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can stay behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if Vex and I went as mist, just the two of us, quickly? Just the two of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may join you two for this as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what are the rest of us going to do? Just wait? Me, Scanlan, and Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can turn into a cloud, and float in there, and see what you want to see, but I'm not turning into mist when my herd is inside that city. If I go in, I'm going in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So why don't we just not go in right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you all go in, I'll stay back with Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not crazy-ish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the four of you convert into mist form, crest up over the edge and start drifting your way over the top of Westruun, leaving Scanlan, Grog, and Reginald amongst the crops.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reginald, you want some ale?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you have some?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I do, yeah, hold on. Get the cask out, pour him a cup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He drinks thirstily, both because he seems genuinely thirsty, and second, it seems like he could use a long, hard drink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pace yourself, son, there's a lot that's here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've been drinking longer than you've been alive, friend." Just (guzzles).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. Another?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll keep them coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, for that, we'll take a quick break, come back here. See you guys here in a few minutes, and we'll continue this story. See you in a minute! [break]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cock goblin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, guys, quick note before we get back into the game. Apparently, the shirt link wasn't working earlier, it is working now. They got it functional, so go ahead and hop on now while you can. Returning from the break, as Grog and Scanlan sit, waiting to hear back from the rest of the team, traversing over towards Westruun, seeking information in their mist forms. The two of you remain behind. The four of you guys who are in mist form, where are you going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we stealthily head towards a pocket of people? Do we see a crowd of people being held?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is your mist form?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is my mist form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ocean. I like it. I'd like you guys to make stealth checks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealth checks!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we still have Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! 39.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way across the rest of the fields. You head over Cole, you can see walking his way to the outside of the western side of the city. You come towards the bottom of the gate. You can see the rigid, small fence structure you noticed when you were far away from the city becomes more clearly visible. It is a series of spears and pikes that are set up as a barrier or a barricade to the outside world to Westruun. You do see adorned atop a number of them a few heads, varying sizes, various people, various ages.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this appear to be goliath-built?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to say. It looks built.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the spikes are facing inward towards the city, or outward?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Outwards. There are breaks in it, but essentially it's partially a pseudo-defense mechanism, it's more as a warning, it's a point of intimidation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So does it look pretty jerry-rigged?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's not anything too classically designed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No flying buttresses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not quite, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doric columns, oh my

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see places where fires have broken out and some places have burned into a giant cluster of ash and broken wood. A quick memory glance at this height, you start looking for specific areas that you recall from memory. One: you glance over and see where you first came to meet Pike, where she and Wilhand lived. That area is the area of town that was, apparently, salvaged from the battle. It still stands, there appears to be very minimal impact. As you give yourself enough closeness to check in, the red brick homestead of Wilhand does appear to be standing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see Wilhand anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this distance, no. You also note, towards the shopping district of Westruun, there is the shop of Abjurist Noja, one of your first enchanter friends who protected you during your first Winter's Crest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! He cast the protection spell on us!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is making me feel very old.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is still the worship district here. You have the various temples. Best you can glance, a few of them have been partially toppled. There is damage to some of the buildings. Still too far away to make out any specific details beyond that, some of the structures having taken a hit in previous conflicts. You're not sure from which source.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the mayor's house where we heard Horace--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Margrave's. Towards the southern central portion of Westruun, south of the main town square where the bulk of your first Winter's Crest festival here in Westruun took place. The Margrave's house is at the very southernmost portion of that. That entire square is lined with row after row of sharpened wood sticks and various other weapons, tridents, broken swords that have been, with ropes, strapped together to form a military barricade. If anything were to attempt to attack from the ground, it would be difficult to do so if this area was filled with prepared soldiers, using these as protective guard. The actual Margrave's home is intact, although at this glance, you can see a lot of it has been defiled, elements of the outside walls are strewn with dark burgundy paint slapped over. You can see what looks to be some sort of strings adorning edges of it, like decoration. You see, walking through this area, what looks to be 12 or 13 or so armed individuals of varying heights. Probably a good six or seven goliaths among them. Others appear to be human, half-orc, it's hard to make out the full details from this distance. They're all on the outskirts surrounding what was previously the Margrave's home. Now the homestead of Kevdak, seemingly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see Kevdak anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea what Kevdak looks like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look for a bigger goliath than the rest, or one that looks older and bigger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. At this distance, it's hard to make out any specific details. You can barely make out the fact that they're goliath. It's only because you've traveled with Grog so long you can pick out the details, the hairless form, the tattoos, the general tone of skin. They're male and female, it's a smattering of all different types of goliaths. Some of different thickness, some that are a little more barrel-chested and wide, some that are a little shorter. There are other similarly dressed individuals that are not goliaths as well, but they seem to be more of a subservient role within the herd than the goliaths that would be the ruling class within this self-contained society. But no one stands out to you as matching the descriptions of Kevdak that Grog gave you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The mansion seems to be where they've based their operations, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seemingly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't see a cluster of prisoners anywhere out in the open?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where's the prison I was being held in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The prison you were being held in was in the Umbra Hills. That's far north of Westruun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's when we fought the Nightmare.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) (imitates Laura) Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see a cluster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you see a what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A cluster of prisoners out in the open at all, or is it just out around--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell because most everyone who lives here is, in some, way, shape, or form a prisoner. You do see at the various gates of the city as you went through, there's about three, four individuals average stationed there. Nobody seems to be entering or exiting. And the pace of those that are not of the herd that you see walking through the city has a feel of hopelessness, or at least their presence outdoors is more of function. They do what they're told, and if they're not, you've already seen what happens to them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe stealth isn't-- maybe Grog's right-- we can't talk, can we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we're fucking clouds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we say go back to the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm gesturing to go. Get out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check, guys, on the way out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan and I have been alone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! You guys make your way westward. Is there anything you guys wanted to accomplish while they were gone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just massage each other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so I turn to Scanlan. And I say: you and I are mates, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, the best of mates.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Could I confide something in you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wasn't aware that you knew what that word meant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (clears throat) Right. Well, I'm full of surprises. One of which is-- so, I had this horrible dream recently, and in the dream, I was killing all these people with this amazing sword that I have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But there were a lot of people, and some of the people that got killed I knew. And I feel it has something to do with this sword that I have. And the secret is: I can hear the sword talking to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like, talking-talking, or you just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, look, so I'm telling you because you and I have such a history, right? And I feel like you won't judge me, but, like, I'm afraid the rest of the group won't quite understand. I don't know if I'm crazy or if this sword is talking to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you see a mouth on it or anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I just hear a voice and I was wondering if maybe I take it out--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, only when I'm holding it. So, like, I could take it out now and we could see maybe if you hear it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I take out Craven Edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take out Craven Edge, you hold it out in front of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Craven Edge. How did you enjoy your snack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was a good snack. A snack it was. If there's more where that came from, "I would be so thankful."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you getting that?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, Grog, I'm not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not hearing anything? No, like, super sexy (low-pitched growl) voice? Nothing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Try one more time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's not worth it. Look, do you want to hold the sword?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure! That's a good idea, actually! Can I hold the sword? How big is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a greatsword. It's almost twice the length of your whole body and probably weighs close to as much as you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you hold the top part and I'll just hold it by the handle, the hilty-part?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hold the blade, and I hand the hilt towards Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you hand the hilt over towards him, there's hesitation in the voice, "Only you are worthy of "holding me. You will hand me to no one."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (grunts) See, now, now, now, Craven, I'm starting to feel like I'm doubting myself. I'm seeing things-- he's talking to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to take it right back, I just want him to experience your glory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a charisma check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. Fuck. That's bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gulp) Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven? Okay. You can't give the sword up. It means too much, and the voice in your head says, "Only those proven worthy to feed me can carry me. And you, Grog--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, hand me the sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (pained) No. On second thought, don't worry about it. It's clearly-- and I take it back-- it's not, it's just-- maybe I just need to see someone or talk to somebody. Clearly, I mean, you don't-- it's talking, you don't hear it, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't hear it, but maybe if you handed it to me, I could.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's really heavy, too. And I sheathe it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I believe him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good! Seven!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three! (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're pretty good at seeing past the deceit of others. This definitely falls under the line of deceit, as adorable as it is to see him try.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, you want to give me the sword. And I will cast Suggestion on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it a wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I haven't used it in a while, and I don't have my thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll pull it up real fast, just to make sure. I'm pretty sure it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Giant modifier on this one. 16. With a modifier of zero.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, 18, if I'm not using my thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like, no, that's a great idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what? That's a great idea! I feel like you should hold this sword. And I hold on to the blade, but I still hand the hilt to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he holds up the sword towards you, you grasp the handle. As his hand touches it, the voice goes, "No! Only you can wield me!" Go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, that's a charisma saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, plus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fighting that impulse, you still hand the blade over. You take the handle. You let go of the weapon. You hold it in your hand now. It's a (heavy thud).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You ruin everything good! You take everything good away from all of us!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's heavy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Throw it into acid, why don't you?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ask it a question!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I talk to it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! And it'll talk right back, it's like that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi, Craven Edge. Have you been talking to my friend Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a long beat of silence. And then a barely audible (annoyed sigh).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sing to it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of a sudden, you hear this tiny voice creep up in the back of your head: "If you truly "wish to hold me in your grasp, I require you to prove to me your worthiness."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it saying something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No?! It's not saying anything?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Craven Edge? How do I prove I'm worthy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blade, all of a sudden, it almost seems to have a slight shift of its own, like a divining rod, and it moves. And the blade shifts away from the direction of you and Grog and gently shifts down the way to an older gentleman who's now returned to picking a few crops and it points in his direction and says, "Prove to me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it Reggie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pointing to Reginald.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not Reggie!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you pointing it at Reggie?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I think I'll try to give the sword back to Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a charisma check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me go ahead and check the rules here, because this could make a difference here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against magic? I'll say yes, because it's technically a magical entity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Witchcraft!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sheer force of personality that begins to exude from this weapon, you sense that it is old, it has seen many a hand, and has probably taken far many more a life. But it's not met a gnome like you before, Scanlan Shorthalt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Never known a gnome like you before!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take this back, will you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! I take it back. It talked to you, then, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, it's creepy as shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's very compelling. I don't know if you should have this, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (confused sputtering) Now, hold on! I just wanted to make sure that I wasn't fucking, you know, batshit crazy, which I'm not! And I'm really glad that we're sharing in this now. But hey! Hey! Don't tell anyone. Promise me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I won't tell anyone. But I might have to ask some questions about this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's why I brought you in! You're all smart, right? And I always want to ask questions like, what's the first thing it remembers, what was it doing with Lord Briarwood--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it tell you to kill things?
