lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot? I know it does, it just told me to kill something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You must be a dark wizard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it tell you to kill things?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! It just says it's hungry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you both hear a voice simultaneously go, "Always hungry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You heard it that time! Holy shit! I feel like Kevin Costner in Field of Dreams and you're James Earl Jones! I've got a friend in this now! (laughing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, so, look, you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is very strange.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They might freak out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to ask about this. When next we see Pike, I'll ask her about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I don't know anything about this. Right, I don't know anything about this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It could be good; there's nothing wrong with being hungry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. It seems magical.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know. Don't know anything about this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure of the nature of this, and you're unable to ascertain which side of the spectrum it lies on as far as morality goes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If it tells you to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would never!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Never!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, yeah there's never even, like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just keep this between us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, totes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just like that time in Emon when we--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --double-teamed--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Eiffel Tower!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep! All right!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that went up my nose!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, a few clusters of wind come landing out of the sky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Green lights?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, you're the mist!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (panicked yelling) Oh! It's just me!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're literally just scared of your hands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (relieved) Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing happened here. How was your trip?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, boring here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Totally boring?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. No action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, not a lot to see there. There's a lot of goliaths and a lot of other bad guys walking around, oppressing very nice-looking people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A lot of goliaths?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They've made really poky fences everywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I'd do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks like if we barged in, straight in, they'd probably have very good fortifications.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also think they're trying to be scary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trying to be scary?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not that you're not scary all the time, Grog. I just think they're like, ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They really want to look scary.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They really want to look tough, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, here's the thing. Do we barge in, totally risk our lives? Or try to find a way around this situation?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a central stronghold of some sort?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a fortress?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's where the mayor lived before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a house?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's like a big house.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: It's a nice house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And if we were to make our way into it, somehow, what would our mission be?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, let's put on the table what we're doing here. Right? Kevdak has the Knuckles. We don't know where he is. He's probably pretty formidable on his own. And in a day or two, a dragon is going to be swinging by, so it's not one problem, it's a very large problem and a

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if Kevdak goes to the sacrificial area where they leave the hoard for the dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wouldn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or if he does rounds to check in on people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also say I think it's more than likely that, in the end, I doubt the dragons would care who is filling the sacrificial plate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As long as someone is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as the plate's full.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As far as this city goes, correct me if I'm wrong, but we have two options. Either we stealth in with the stealthy people, not me included, and we try and pickpocket Kevdak for the Knuckles. Or I challenge Kevdak for the Knuckles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Kevdak known to ever wander off by himself? Does he take interest in his subjects to where we could corner him alone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or is it a walk in and try to challenge him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could take out that guard, what was his name, Cole or something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Cole was heading back to the city, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we could find one of your goliath friends, hold them hostage, and draw out Kevdak that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They won't care about a hostage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There also could be the issue of are they going to go looking for Horace?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe. Not that hard, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could do some sort of a diversion, set a fire or something that would draw them out. Or set a fire to the house they live in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not a bad idea. What would bring Kevdak out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog. Grog would bring Kevdak out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to march in there, solo, while we stealth--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, while we all stealth around in the rooftops watching, ready to act.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, I'm curious how tied you feel to the ways of your people now, or if you do. Do you feel the need, yourself, to face him on your own, or would you be amenable, would you be friendly to the idea of my sister and I softening him up for a moment, and then letting you have at it? What do you want to do here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So my fear is this: that if it's anyone but me and him, everyone gets involved. Not just us, but all 60 of them in that stronghold. I don't think we walk out of that very well. I'm not opposed to facing him head-on and seeing what fate has in store for me while you free any prisoners that might be around, or ransacking his house for any fun bits, but I think he's going to have the Knuckles on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Question. Is your herd and Kevdak the type where, if you start getting the upper hand in this fight, will the herd move to protect Kevdak?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So they'll honor a one-on-one fight? They'll honor that? They won't pull a fast one and swarm in when he's on his last leg?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell us this. If we walk in with you into town, is that not good? Should you walk into town alone and we lurk in the shadows?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to be on a hilltop, like standing on a hilltop? Because we could arrange that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Regardless, I think now is not the time. Perhaps we go look for Osysa's mate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't want to do this now? It seems like now or never!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We know where Kevdak is, he doesn't seem to be going anywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We may not know where he is after this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He seems pretty fortified. And we don't have Pike. And this is her hometown.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Judging by the-- no, I didn't hear any of that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I don't know what to do in this situation, I'm looking to you all for guidance. But I do know two things. One is that I don't want you to fall, Grog. We need you. And I do not want you to fall to Kevdak. And second: if you do fall, I'm not willing to walk away without those Knuckles, not for me to use, but for us to use. We need those Knuckles. So if you are to fall at his hand, which I do not want, I don't know that I can honorably walk away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, yeah, speaking from a selfish position, if I fall, you can really do whatever the fuck you want. I think honor is bupkis at that point. So I don't mind what you do after that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not going to fall, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My first point, Grog, I need

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's very sweet. Uh. Emotion. I would like it if Pike was here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We wait.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, could we hear Horace when he was interrogating him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Judging by the way Horace was speaking, it sounds like they're pretty settled in for right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're not nomadic any more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sitting pretty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they ain't going anywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we know where he is now. It'll give us a little bit more time to formulate our plan? This is your fight, Grog, we'll follow you in this one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to go in there with Pike?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's wait for Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We wait for Pike. We wait until Gilmore's up and standing and we bring Pike here with us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike might even be an emotional trigger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The herd if they see her, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They never met her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. They probably don't give any shits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's just do this. Let's go after Osysa's mate. If we don't learn or find anything incredibly valuable, we're at the same place we are now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then we can kick the tires.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we still have mist possibilities?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We do, we can float on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Reginald still around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You notice that Reginald's sitting there, clutching his full stachel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi, Reggie!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're going to help you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to go get some reinforcements.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You might have to wait a little while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's okay, but you're coming back, right?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We most definitely are. Spread the word that hope is alive. We will find a way to beat this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. I'll be careful. You be careful, too. Come back as soon as you think you can, when "you're ready."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't tell anyone what you saw here, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good luck."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If anyone asks where Horace is, what happened to Horace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't seen him for days."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good answer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spits on the pile where his corpse is. "All right. Hope to see you soon, then." He turns around and begins walking back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Reginald.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all take a moment, collect yourselves, revert back to your mist form, coast out of the farmland, heading southward in the direction of the Frostweald. And there, we're going to finish our campaign for the evening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, Grog!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Feeling the pressure now? Feel it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog showing restraint and caution!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it! I want Pike here, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so do I.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's too big for Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could have taken them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could totally have taken them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could have. But it's where Pike and her family raised Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seems appropriate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Her schedule's so busy, but if we can get her next week...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, next week we do the sphinx, and then the week after.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll figure it out. We'll get her back sometime soon, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it takes 17 episodes, we will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're in New York. Can you stuff her in your suitcase while you're there, bring her back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good call!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just commandeer her, she's tiny!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's little!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She might be a little loud.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Skype is rough, guys, it makes me feel bad for Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll have you back soon, buddy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're not! You need to be here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (fake crying)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Hopefully we'll be having Ashley back when Blindspot releases her between seasons, we'll have her back for a few months.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Season break!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whenever that happens soon. We'll see you guys back here next week for the next length of the journey of Vox Machina. Until then, is it Thursday yet? See you guys soon.
